name: Albany Taco Fest 2025
description: Celebrate the Capital Region's love for tacos with local vendors, live music, and family-friendly activities. Featuring a variety of taco styles from traditional to fusion.

name: Live Jazz Night at Villa Di Como Ristorante
venue: Villa Di Como Ristorante, 286 Lark St, Albany, NY
description: Enjoy an evening of smooth jazz with local musicians at this beloved Italian eatery known for its cozy ambiance and authentic dishes.

name: Albany Latin Festival
description: Experience vibrant Latin culture through music, dance, and food, featuring salsa bands and authentic street eats like empanadas and arepas.

name: Dinner and Beats at Toro Cantina
venue: Toro Cantina, 111 Wolf Rd, Albany, NY
description: Savor modern Mexican cuisine with a live DJ spinning Latin and hip-hop beats at this trendy spot known for innovative tacos and margaritas.

name: Rock Concert at The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
venue: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen, 79 N Pearl St, Albany, NY
description: Catch an electrifying performance by a local indie rock band paired with creative comfort food at this popular downtown venue.

name: Fusion Feast at Villa Vosilla
venue: Villa Vosilla, 6302 Main St, Tannersville, NY
description: A unique dining event blending Italian and Asian flavors, hosted by a boutique resort with a reputation for creative culinary experiences.

name: Albany Jazz Festival
description: A day-long celebration of jazz with performances by regional and national artists along the Hudson Riverfront. Free admission with food vendors on-site.

name: PearlPalooza 2025
venue: North Pearl Street, Downtown Albany, NY
description: Albany's signature street festival featuring live music from multiple bands, local food vendors, and craft beer. A must-attend cultural event.

name: Toro Cantina Taco Night
venue: Toro Cantina, 111 Wolf Rd, Albany, NY
description: Weekly taco night featuring authentic Mexican flavors and creative specials. A local favorite for vibrant dining in the Capital Region.

name: Live Folk Music at Caffe Lena
venue: Caffe Lena, 47 Phila St, Saratoga Springs, NY
description: An intimate evening of folk music at the historic Caffe Lena, featuring up-and-coming regional artists. A cultural gem near Albany.

name: Albany Food & Wine Festival
venue: Empire State Plaza Convention Center, Albany, NY
description: A premier event showcasing local chefs, wineries, and breweries, with tasting sessions and live demonstrations.

name: Art on Lark 2025
description: Annual street festival showcasing local artists, live music, and food vendors along Lark Street. A celebration of creativity in the Capital Region.

name: Capital Repertory Theatre: 'Rent'
description: Experience the iconic musical 'Rent' performed live by the talented cast at Capital Rep, a cornerstone of Albany's theater scene.

name: Albany Institute of History & Art: New Exhibit Opening
venue: Albany Institute of History & Art, Albany, NY
description: Explore a new exhibit featuring regional artists and historical artifacts at one of the oldest museums in the U.S.
